July 11, 1931 D Fairford Contest (March Section)
Fairford Contest (March Section) 100 March Contest Fairford Contest fairford-contest-march-section
None
Fairford, Gloucestershire, England, UK
Prizes 1st £2.10s.0d., 2nd £2., 3rd £1.10s.0d., 4th £1.
Held in conjunction with all three sections of the Fairford Contest.
It is believed that over 40 bands were involved in the march contest.
Oct. 12, 2012, 6:01 p.m. Oct. 12, 2012, 6:11 p.m.
1 Paulton Silver R. W. Kingman
2 Pangbourne & District Silver Band A. Reed
3 Tadley Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
4 Keynsham Brass Band Herbert S. Perry
